units.title: Organoid dissociation and reseeding for cytokine treatment
units.text: For the cytokine treatments, organoids were dissociated into five- to ten-cell fragments using TrypLE (Invitrogen) and reseeded in Matrigel. After 6 days, organoids were treated for 6 days by supplementing the culture medium with 50 ng ml−1 TNF and 200 ng ml−1 RANKL (Acro Biosystems) for TNF treatment28 or with 400 ng ml−1 IL-4 and 40 ng ml−1 IL-13 (Acro Biosystems)
units.rationale: This is a detailed, actionable protocol step describing the dissociation, reseeding, and cytokine treatment of organoids with specific reagents and durations.

units.title: Organoid dissociation for scRNA-seq
units.text: First, culture medium was removed and organoids were incubated in Cell Recovery Solution (Corning) for 40 min at 4 °C. Next, organoids were transferred to 1% bovine serum albumin (BSA)-coated tubes using HBSS–1% BSA buffer while pipetting thoroughly to facilitate dissociation.
units.rationale: This describes a precise, step-by-step procedure for dissociating organoids prior to single-cell RNA sequencing, including reagents, timing, and technique.

units.title: scRNA-seq data preprocessing and normalization
units.text: For each sample, the raw counts were normalized to a total count of 10,000 and then log-transformed. From these normalized counts, the top 3,000 highly variable genes were identified using the default settings in Scanpy.
units.rationale: This is a clear, technical protocol step for preprocessing single-cell RNA-seq data with specific parameters and tools.

units.title: Dimensionality reduction and clustering of scRNA-seq data
units.text:
PCA was performed on the normalized data, and the top 30 principal components were chosen for calculating the k nearest neighbors (kNN). Using the kNN, a UMAP was generated to visualize the data in a lower-dimensional space. To cluster the data, the Leiden clustering method with a resolution of 2 was applied.
The most specific cell type was annotated for each cluster based on these criteria.
units.rationale: This outlines a complete computational protocol for dimensionality reduction and clustering in single-cell analysis with specific parameters and methods.
